text: waleajayiz min alnisa' allaati qaedan ean alastimtae walshahwat likuburihina, fala yatmaeuna fi alrijal lilzuwaji, wala yatmae fihina alrijal kadhaluka, fahula' la haraj ealayhina 'an yadaen bed thiabahuna kalradaa' aldhy yakun fawq althiyab ghyr muzahirat wala mutaearidat lilziynati, wlubshn hadhih althiyab - strana wteffana- 'ahsan lahuna. wallah samie li'aqwalikum, ealim biniaatikum wa'aemalikum
